Reviews.Title: It's ok, but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my 25th birthday from my mom.  The quality is very good, and very easy to operate and switch programs to match the conditions. Yet, sometimes it's too slow when I want to capture a good moment, it takes a couple seconds from the moment you press the button until it's actually taking the photo, and hop! the great moment is gone... so consider that when you are buying this camera. Furthermore, the chargeable battery that comes with it also runs off pretty fast so you might want to consider that too.Overall I give it 3 stars, because I like the design, the convenience of usage and the quality.and I took 2 stars away for the battery and the good moments I wasn't able to capture in time.Hope this was helpful to all of you who are looking for a good camera at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Honglimin
Reviews.Content: It is very intuitively designed for the person like me who just want to turn on it and shot a good photos without the presetting. Also it is good for the person who wants a good quality picture but no to read too much instruction and not to paid to much $.

Reviews.Title: it is good
Reviews.Author: Yifei
Reviews.Content: just as some one who bought it said, it is not the best, but as for this price, we could say it is fine, cost effective

Reviews.Title: camera review
Reviews.Author: lori
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a combo camera and video and didn't want to pay a lot of money.  This little camera takes better video that my sony camcorder.  Great little camera that takes great pics and video.......and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: A  Very Good Camera For A Hobby or Beginning Photographer
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. "Telling It Like It Is"
Reviews.Content: Not what I was looking for. Wanted a different lens and more megapixsels. Just too basic of a camera for my needs. A good buy for a beginner or hobby photographer. Canons are great cameras and the price was an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: Not the best Canon
Reviews.Author: Emily Ginder
Reviews.Content: I find that the quality of the pictures is not as good as other point and shoot cameras made by Canon.  The pictures are not as sharp and many appear to be out of focus.  I do like the carry case!

Reviews.Title: Very astute daughter recommended- she was absolutely correct.
Reviews.Author: Judie Williams
Reviews.Content: Daughter recommended as I needed for her wedding- she stated you can trust canon to have a great product.  She was correct .  Easy to use - easy to carry- great pictures Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful  Product and Service
Reviews.Author: Gayla S. Kemink "Gayla Reads!"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this product. I ordered two of them at different times and have ha d a wonderful experience with the company. I highly recommend GEM

Reviews.Title: Bought this for wife...
Reviews.Author: Rooftopp
Reviews.Content: It takes great pics and very good 720 HD video.  The pouch provides good protection.  This is probably our third Canon camera.  At the time I picked this up at a very good price under $200 and when they break I buy another.  My wife doesnt bother with all the manual settings- mainly used on auto setting.  16 Megapixels is overkill the 5x optical is nice.  Image stabilizer is very desirable.  She likes the camera so much she won't let me use it :-)

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Canon Bundle
Reviews.Author: MariJems
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle as a gift for my daughter. She loves it, especially the BuiltNY bag! She says the camera takes great shots and is compact, not bulky. Great purchase price too!

Reviews.Title: Good but tardy
Reviews.Author: AVG
Reviews.Content: The camera is a good product and it is exactly what I hoped it would be like. The only downside to this whole ordering experience was that it was a week late to arrive. Other than that, a good quality camera is always nice to have.

Reviews.Title: Check best buy
Reviews.Author: Christopher Hutchinson
Reviews.Content: If you don't need a pink case! Basically the same price as it is here.  It's actually a little cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Smart Little Camera With Good Quality Pics
Reviews.Author: Sachith
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a present for my sister in law. I received it today and it seems likes a very nice and Smart camera with everything we need. I already have a high end camera From Canon PowerShot, Sx 20 IS. So, I thought that this camera should be also good. Got this bundle for Black Friday Deal from Amazon.Features that I love,1. Fish Eye Effect2. Long Exposure - Where you can change the Exposure time ranging from 1 Sec - 15 Sec's3. Smile Shutter Features.Photos are in Good Quality even in low light conditions.I think this will be a good Present.Canon PowerShot A3300 IS Bundle with 4 GB Memory Card, Strap and Pink Polka Dot BuiltNY Pouch

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Carmen Brown
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and takes good pictures. Didn't take long to figure out the features. Loved the polka dot pouch and the size of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: 3fan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because it was small (which is what I wanted) and it was a great buy as a bundle.  I do find it a bit difficult to use.  I am technically impaired so don't go by my comments.  Customer service was great as I received it in just a couple of days.

Reviews.Title: Canon , always a good choice.
Reviews.Author: Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Content: As always , I depended on Canon and was not disappointed.  I wanted a camera that would fit in my purse, take good pictures (just set on auto  and not too expensive. the Canon Powershot A3300 IS Bundle fits the bill.It takes great pictures, has the rechargeable battery which I did not have before (which I love), and the camera is so "classy" looking.  What a nice gift to myself!!Canon PowerShot A3300 IS Bundle with 4 GB Memory Card, Strap and Pink Polka Dot BuiltNY Pouch

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: rynow28
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase. A great product, brand new. Very good camera and it brings with extra gifts. The price was good, reasonable, and the shipping was very fast. Canon is a very good brand, and this camera will not disapoint you.

Reviews.Title: Struggles with focus in low lighting
Reviews.Author: crimson
Reviews.Content: The camera is fabulous! Dont get me wrong, but this little gem takes breathtaking pictures in daylight with just the right amount of punch in the colors to make it seem vivid! Lens distortion is not apparent so it doesnt give your face that "fat" look during close ups! Unfortunately, it struggles a lot in low lighting. Im not talking about dark restaurants, but dark clubs. lol. I know it's too much to ask from a point and shoot, but I'd still like to get decent dark scene shots without getting the bg all black.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera, worth the price.
Reviews.Author: BB
Reviews.Content: This camera was worth the every penny I spent on it. It works great, and cheapest I could find for the features it provides.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: D. Stevens
Reviews.Content: Gave it as an early Christmas present to my daughter.  She loves it.  Takes great pictures and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Sister's trip to Paris
Reviews.Author: lg
Reviews.Content: My sister won a trip to Paris . I gave her this camera to take picture. She leaves this month but says she has tried it out and the camera takes great picture. Can't wait to see Paris

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot Review
Reviews.Author: Maureen
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  My 11-year-old nephew taught me how to use it, and I've been very satisfied with the ease of use and the quality of pictures and video.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the price
Reviews.Author: pga
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my teenager to use on vacation. It works well and photos are good but not as good as the Elph (sp?) I bought a few years ago. However, I'm a big fan of Canon cameras and would not buy any other brand.  Easy to use software and good quality photos.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a young girl
Reviews.Author: Lizbeth M.
Reviews.Content: I gifted this to my daughter and she loves the camera, the feminine colors really go great and the case is cute as well

Reviews.Title: Not So Good
Reviews.Author: George H. Karas "xiudan1966"
Reviews.Content: After i purchased a Canon Camera three months later it broke.I took it back to the store where i purchased it.They sent it to Canon who in turn sent it to some company they sub-contract to repair their cameras.They said the lens was broke and would cost $100 dollars to repair it as Canon would not cover the warranty.So i told them to send it back to the company i purchased it from so they could scrap it.Canon you have poor quality cameras and dont honor your warranties.I will never buy another Canon Camera or never purchase another thing from what was supposed to be the "Best" place to "Buy" a camera!
